author: mikemccand
msg: LUCENE-2682: add test that confirm we can index more than 2B terms in one segment, @Ignored since it takes > 4 hrs to run on a fast machine

author: odeakin
msg: In Java 6, the wildcard * can be specified in the classpath and should be expanded to add all .jar/.JAR files at that location to the classpath if they exist. This commit implements that wildcard expansion and matches the RI behaviour, including cases when expansion is not possible.

author: slaws
msg: Disable dependency on org.oasis-open.sca as these artifacts are not published in maven so cause the main compliance test build to fail

author: slaws
msg: Correct case of the name of the JCA_General_POJO.zip which was all upper case for some reason

author: julianfoad
msg: (check_op_depth): Fix a SQL statement to avoid false matches. Fix error
